text: The Chițiu is a left tributary of the river Jiu in Romania. Its source is in the Parâng Mountains. It flows into the Jiu near the Lainici Monastery, in the Jiu Gorge. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== * Trasee turistice – județul Gorj Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Gorj County
title: Chițiu
